title: Celtics bench shines in bounce-back win over Magic: 7 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Luka Garza scored 16 points in 17 minutes, contributing significantly to Celtics' 111-107 win over Magic.
Jordan Walsh made a defensive impact, helping limit Franz Wagner's shooting and hitting a crucial three-pointer.
Anfernee Simons scored 25 points in the first half, fueling a pivotal second-quarter scoring run for the Celtics.

title: Jason Varitek is happy to be back with Red Sox on a new deal
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Jason Varitek has signed a new contract to remain with the Boston Red Sox as a coach for the 2026 season.
Varitek has been part of the Red Sox organization for 28 years, serving various roles after retiring as a player.
Carlos Narvaez, a key player mentioned by Varitek, excelled in 2025 with a .241 average, 15 home runs, and 50 RBIs.

title: Patriots’ explosive rookie class breaks through at perfect time in Tampa
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots rookies Kyle Williams and TreVeyon Henderson scored three touchdowns in a 28-23 win over the Buccaneers.
Williams and Henderson contributed 222 of the team's 435 total yards with plays over 50 yards each.
Rookies Will Campbell, Jared Wilson, and Craig Woodson strengthened the Patriots with solid offensive and defensive performances.

title: Oddsmakers have Drake Maye as NFL MVP favorite
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Drake Maye leads the NFL MVP odds at +250 according to FanDuel and other major oddsmakers.
Maye threw for 270 yards and two touchdowns in New England's 28-23 win over the Buccaneers.
Maye has completed 71.7% of his passes this season, with 2,555 yards and 19 touchdowns.

title: Rob Gronkowski announces that he will ‘retire as a Patriot’
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Rob Gronkowski will sign a one-day contract to retire with the New England Patriots.
Gronkowski played nine seasons with the Patriots, winning three Super Bowls and setting franchise records.
Gronkowski, now a broadcaster, joined Tom Brady in Tampa Bay before retiring from the NFL in 2022.

title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against the Buccaneers
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Rookies TreVeyon Henderson and Kyle Williams shined, each scoring touchdowns to lead the Patriots to a 28-23 victory over the Buccaneers.
The Patriots extended their win streak to seven games, with quarterback Drake Maye providing crucial big plays despite some struggles.
Tight ends Austin Hooper and Hunter Henry were ineffective, with limited targets and little impact during the game.

title: 10 takeaways from Patriots’ impressive road win over Buccaneers
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Rookies TreVeyon Henderson and Kyle Williams scored three touchdowns, contributing to Patriots' 28-23 victory over the Buccaneers.
New England Patriots extended their win streak to seven games, improving their season record to 8-2.
Quarterback Drake Maye threw for 270 yards, including two touchdowns, despite a fourth-quarter interception.

title: MBTA Transit Police officer facing drunk driving charge after allegedly crashing into pole
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: MBTA Transit Police officer Jonathan Daveiga, 27, faces a drunk driving charge after crashing into a pole on Oct. 19.
Daveiga allegedly failed to stop or yield, was arrested for DUI, and pleaded not guilty at his Oct. 20 arraignment.
He is on 'modified duty' pending court proceedings and refused a breathalyzer, risking license suspension per Massachusetts law.

title: Allston Car Wash employees still in federal custody after ICE raid
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Nine Allston Car Wash employees with work permits were detained by ICE agents on November 4.
ICE has not disclosed details on the detained employees' statuses, causing challenges for their attorney.
Allegations of mistreatment have emerged, with reports of detainees not receiving basic necessities.

title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Nikki Glaser hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Nikki Glaser hosted the November 8 episode of 'Saturday Night Live,' with musical guest Sombr.
Glaser rose to prominence after a standout performance at the 2024 Tom Brady roast.
Highlights included Glaser's monologue, Sombr's performances, and Pete Davidson's 'Weekend Update' return.
